name: Urine Trouble
description:
Drink all the tea you can, but be sure to get rid of it before your bladder bursts!

Created as part of Trijam #156. The theme was "tea time". The game was created in under three hours.

Controls:

Move with the left and right arrow keys

See other Trijam #156 entries here: Trijam #156: The 3 hour game jam - itch.io
